description: A court rules David Noakes will lose his aircraft, boat, Aston Martin, Rolls Royce and bank accounts.
title: Guernsey 'cancer cure' conman to see assets seized
title_page: Guernsey 'cancer cure' conman to see assets seized - BBC News
maintext: "Noakes put public health at risk through the unlicensed manufacturing and sale of GcMAF products, which were not fit for human consumption or for use as medicines," he said.
